events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday where another vehicle collided with mine at an intersection.
The claim has been categorised as an Auto Accident claim due to the collision involving a personal vehicle.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the car accident claim and will be in contact shortly.
We officially acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle collision. We are working on it.
Please provide a copy of the police report and photos of the damaged car to process your auto accident claim.
I have submitted the police report and several photos showing the extent of the damage caused to my vehicle.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing the documents and evidence related to your car accident claim.
The investigation for your vehicle collision claim is now complete, confirming liability and damage extent.
We have proposed a settlement amount for repairing your car, based on damage assessment and coverage terms.
The customer responded to the settlement offer with some questions about repair timelines and coverage details.
Your car accident claim has been approved, and we are now proceeding with the final steps for payment issuance.
The settlement payment has been processed and issued to your linked bank account for car repair costs.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed after payment, thank you for your patience during this process.
The files and records of your recently closed vehicle accident claim have been archived for future reference.
